EMERGENCY LIGHTING INSPECTION CERTIFICATE

Site: Connaught Square, London W2 2HL

Inspection Date: 15th March 2024
Next Inspection Due: 15th March 2025

Inspector: John Davies, Fire Safety Ltd
Certificate Number: EL-2024-CS-001

All emergency lighting units tested in accordance with BS 5266-1:2016

RESULT: SATISFACTORY - All systems operational

Emergency lighting system complies with current regulations.
Annual inspection completed.
